response.original_title: Rick Steves' The Holy Land: Israelis and Palestinians Today
response.overview: This hour-long special weaves together both the Israeli and the Palestinian narratives. In Israel, we go from the venerable ramparts of Jerusalem to the vibrant modern skyline of Tel Aviv. In Palestine, we harvest olives near Hebron, visit a home in Bethlehem, and pop into a university in Ramallah. We also learn about security walls, disputed settlements, and the persistent challenges facing the region.
response.title: Rick Steves' The Holy Land: Israelis and Palestinians Today

results.name: Rick Steves' The Holy Land: Israelis and Palestinians Today
